title: Your Majesty, Please Behave Yourself - Novel Updates
tags: Complex Family Relationships   Cunning Protagonist   Demons   Evil Gods   Magic   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Wars
author: 灯里呀
description:
After transmigrating to a different world, Valerius Licinius got the greatest cheat. He became the Ultimate Demon Lord!

[After awakening, you will gain eternal life, invincibility, omniscience, and omnipotence.]
Awakening condition:

[1. Experience true death.]
[2. Bear infamy of ages.]
Note: For the demon lord’s safety, before awakening, and as a protection during the novice period, you’ll have no other ability than immortality.

Licinius: ???

In order to die, he tried a thousand methods but all of them failed to keep him dead. Licinius started to think that the only one who could kill him was God.>
